function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Relocating businesses, schools, and housing across cities with unique transportation networks may impact the growth rate and evolution of epidemics.","Impact":"May result in altered disease spread patterns and outbreak severity.","Mitigation":"Conduct detailed risk assessments and consider implementing targeted public health interventions.","Technologies":"GIS mapping, network analysis, and epidemiological modeling.","People":"Residents of cities affected by the relocation of businesses, schools, and housing.","Owner":"Public health authorities, urban planners, and policymakers."}]}
